sentences.en: Commentators are eulogizing about the 17-year-old left-hander.
sentences.cn: 解说员都在夸赞这位17岁的左撇子选手。

sentences.en: I eulogize the tall and straight trunk of the white poplar.
sentences.cn: 我赞美白杨树那挺拔的树干.

sentences.en: It can surmount obstacles, eulogize differences, stimulate inspirations and bring about instructive effects and wealth.
sentences.cn: 它可以跨越障碍, 颂扬差异, 激发灵感,带来教益,创造财富.

sentences.en: The poem does not eulogize the dead soldiers.
sentences.cn: 这首诗并未歌颂阵亡的士兵。

sentences.en: When the rain season the blossom of the early spring, we start to eulogize our youth.
sentences.cn: 当雨季催生着初春的花蕾时, 我们开始讴歌我们的青春.

sentences.en: Why should we not eulogize the people, the creators of the history of mankind?
sentences.cn: 对于人民, 这个人类世界历史的创造者,为什么不应该歌颂 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: to praise someone or something very much
